attributes.action: help people on benifit that breaks the chains
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: many people out of work or on benifit of some kind would love to find work but if they dont have training they cant get work i would like everyone on benifit to be offerd a grant career loans dont work as banks dont help i figger up to one half of a years benifit as long as the training they book shows real ability to gain them employment
